title: Comicking
author: Comicking
content: I don't know how to add images but if you want proof I have videos and cash in/cash out receipts you can deposit as little as you like pretty much I think rhe min is $5 its based in the Philippines and it's an underground e-sabong site. They have 3 seperate streams on the same site 1 is vietnamese and 2 are Filipino. It's basically baccarat but with even better odds.THERE IS NO HOUSE EDGE!!! It's completely 50/50! I started with $100 and slowly climbed up to $220 before cashing out. They can cash you in and out with crypto or even paypal. If your interested pm me I'll send you my Facebook and we can get you setup.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Comicking on August 22, 2023, 08:43:53 AMIf your interested pm me I'll send you my Facebook and we can get you setup.Just few days ago you were searching for a site that offers cockfighting gambling and now you have seen one that’s legit, how did you know that’s it’s legit if you have only being using it for a short duration? The fact that you have received your payment once or twice does not automatically makes it legit, there are scam sites out there that participate in selective scamming so you coming to a forum and promoting a site that you recently started using seems shady.Not to discourage those that are interested in betting in online cockfights but when dealing with this user please make sure you’re extremely careful cause there’s a possibility of getting into a shady business and because right now you’re trusting on his words without any proofs whatsoever so do take extreme caution.

If your interested pm me I'll send you my Facebook and we can get you setup.Why is it that one need to PM you before one can have access to the casino. Why don't you drop a picture of the casino or the name of the casino so that we can access it by ourselves. I smell something fishery from your thread and claims because you are a newbie and have zero reputation,there is high possibility that you will start asking for funds.I believe all your receipts and videos are fake as it was planned by you guys. Please think of how you can learn and grow here instead of having the mindset to scam people because nobody will fall for fall. Be careful with OP and you should know that you are on your own if something goes wrong between both of you when you fall for his plan.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I was wondering how sudden you got this after putting up a search notice on it. Anyways I became curious when I saw this post of yours and what made me pick interest was the fact you requested that prospective clients pm you separately which I see as funny and fishy. You claimed you do not know how to upload pictures here but you know how to create a topic. What stops you from upgrading your account to a copper member so you could be able to do that. Nevertheless, the way and manner at which you started looks questionable OP and here you are  telling members about Facebook page for a setup process who does that. Do you think members here would fall so cheap for your gimmicks. I would not be surprised seeing a newbie account testifying to your work as that has being the usual way scammers do.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: It seems that cockfighting is popular in Southeast Asia only. I doubt that people in other regions would be interested in betting on such "platform". I'm totally against animal abuse and I'm sure that other people share my views.A cockfighting casino, that accepts Paypal payments? This sounds ridiculous to me. Even the normal fiat casinos are staying away from Paypal because of the chargebacks. I guess that the Paypal payments would be "friends and family", which also seems suspicious.Why do you want to keep this "cockfighting casino" a secret?

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: I doubt the authenticity of the OP. A few days ago, they posted a topic searching for a cockfighting casino, and now they're promoting an underground casino that uses PayPal. It doesn't make sense to use PayPal in this context, as there's a risk of chargebacks and the payee can dispute the transaction and reclaim the paid amount. Regardless, for those who are interested, it is crucial to carefully consider before using such a platform. Moreover, why would anyone bet on animal killing when there are other options that provide the same kind of adrenaline rush?

If your interested pm me I'll send you my Facebook and we can get you setupI still want to remind people that compared to other betting games, cockfighting is very addictive, and don't just believe OP that he is making a lot of money, the operators of these cockfighting sites are manipulating the outcome you will see in your dashboard that one cock is a heavy favorite, so you will bet on it, but that cock was drugged to make it lose and the underdog wins the match.It was exposed in one documentary why many are losing money on cockfighting because of manipulation, these cockfighting platforms offer very generous rewards which is why he is promoting these platforms.I recommend that you continue playing in Crypto casinos you have a good chance of winning here even if there's a house edge.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I call this deceptive marketing Quote from: Comicking on August 20, 2023, 06:10:10 AMAnybody know of any crypto casinos that offer cockfighting? preferably vietnamese thai cambodian or filipinoHe is asking for cockfighting sites to check if many of us here have played or know how to bet on cockfighting but the truth is OP is part of a cockfighting platform and here he is promoting an online cockfighting platform.I have suspicious of OP's claim that the platform uses Paypal as a payment processor, Paypal never supports illegal gambling platforms like cockfighting, your account will be flagged if they traced that you are using your account to bet on an illegal platform and Paypal is so good in tracing their users' activities, and of course, online cockfighting is fixed, you can win some but lose most of the time.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: Quote from: Comicking on August 22, 2023, 08:43:53 AMI don't know how to add images but if you want proof I have videos and cash in/cash out receipts you can deposit as little as you like pretty much I think rhe min is $5 its based in the Philippines and it's an underground e-sabong site. They have 3 seperate streams on the same site 1 is vietnamese and 2 are Filipino. It's basically baccarat but with even better odds.THERE IS NO HOUSE EDGE!!! It's completely 50/50! I started with $100 and slowly climbed up to $220 before cashing out. They can cash you in and out with crypto or even paypal. If your interested pm me I'll send you my Facebook and we can get you setup.man I confess that this whole story of yours is very strange, because as @Cantsay said, days ago you were looking for a site that offered Cockfighting bets, but to add what @Cantsay is that in the same thread you were asking about Cockfighting you said that you had many accounts of many sites that offered this type of bets but that the problem was that they asked for your phone number, they asked that you have a bank account in Vietnam and that created constraints for you, for example having to depend on people like that countries, so it is something that you cannot directly take into account, so why do you insist on betting on it under these inappropriate conditions? this is my first point that I keep asking myselfnow going to the second point and that you are offering a service equal to the services that I said were inappropriate, for all people to understand what I am talking about, I will put what you yourself posted a few days ago:Quote from: Comicking on August 21, 2023, 02:48:54 AMQuote from: btc_angela on August 20, 2023, 07:18:02 AMQuote from: Comicking on August 20, 2023, 06:10:10 AMAnybody know of any crypto casinos that offer cockfighting? preferably vietnamese thai cambodian or filipinoAs far as I know there is none that supports cockfighting on crypto based casinos, sorry to burst the bubble for you.But if you are looking for none crypto casinos, there are a lot, but it is supposedly local though. So if you are outside of the country then I don't think you can bet or even access the online cockfighting site as it might detect your IP although you can get away with it by using VPN, but I don't recommend it.Yes this is the problem ive been having. I have SEVERAL 100% legitamate cockfighting casinos but ALL of them require you to have a vietnamese/cambodian/thai bank account, and phone number. Perhaps if I could get in touch with somebody in one of these countries they could help me, but then I will be completely at the mercy of this itermediary trusting them to handle my deposits, and withdrawals! I really find it shocking that there are no websites that are more international. Not a great business model. Literally trying to give these guys thousands of dollars and they cant take it.see that what you are saying is that you cannot create a bank account in vietnamese, cambodian and thailand, so I also assume that you cannot create a bank account in the philippines, so how are you coming to this thread to make this proposal? My assumption is that you want someone from this forum who is from the Philippines and has a Philippine bank account to create an account on these cockfighting sites and keep betting with your money and then, when withdrawing, that person sends you a part of the money.Now something I can't understand, and because even though you have paypal on these sites, you still need someone from the Philippines, wouldn't it be easier for you to create a paypal account and use it on this site? if you already have a paypal account everything will be even easier for you. my advice: do not use methods like these to continue with this type of betting, if the sites are not evaluated in your country then do not use them, using other people's accounts even if it is indirectly is not good and is not reliable, people can just disappear with your money and you can't complain

I guess that the Paypal payments would be "friends and family", which also seems suspicious.Why do you want to keep this "cockfighting casino" a secret?  Apart from the animal abuse in cockfighting, it's obvious ops that the title of the thread is a turn-off for many of us because companies and projects that flaunt Legit in front of the statement pause a possible scam ability since scammers are found of using such terms to deceive they victims into believing that the project is a legit one. Animal fights is an unpopular games and are not known to many parts of the world,  although,  there are places where this kind of animal fight is most popular and that is truly in Asia and some parts of Africa.

comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on August 22, 2023, 12:37:29 PMI call this deceptive marketing He is asking for cockfighting sites to check if many of us here have played or know how to bet on cockfighting but the truth is OP is part of a cockfighting platform and here he is promoting an online cockfighting platform.Bullseye. Such stuff is prevalent in 3rd world countries for sure, but you can only find them offline(Not online).

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: Comicking on August 22, 2023, 08:43:53 AMI don't know how to add images but if you want proof I have videos and cash in/cash out receipts you can deposit as little as you like pretty much I think rhe min is $5 its based in the Philippines and it's an underground e-sabong site.In order to add images on your post you are supposed to reach full member rank first, though that should not be an inconvenient if you truly wanted to show proof of whatever you say. You can still upload your images in a hosting service like imgur and post the links here, so we can check on your receipts.Also, It is very suspicious that you are talking about such service and you only offer to share details to those you contact you privately, it is very shady. I would advice anyone interested in OPs offer to proceed with caution, there are already enough red flags in his behavior and the secretive nature of the information he alleges to have within his power. Do not ever send your satoshis to a shady place and do not install any software you are instructed to.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Comicking on August 22, 2023, 08:43:53 AMSnippedOP gambling board may be a large community on itself with varieties of activities and members bringing in their ideas daily to see new things emerging, opportunities are also coming in through these which indicates that there's a lot of prospect with the gambling section, moreover trust is also very important to help maintain integrity and reputation, if you're to shill or advertise for a corperate gambling organizations you're free, if you're offering down your own service as well there's nothing bad in that, but don't get yourself involved in anything that will look shady and people will not trust you.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I guess it's better if you provide the platform here so that everybody has a fair chance to try check it themselves. My concern, however, is that this is illegal gambling. The platform you're referring to is not registered. Law enforcements authorities could conduct a raid anytime. Moreover, the platform could just do a rug pull and all money is gone. The operators could just vanish all of a sudden. They could lock accounts and freeze funds. There can't be accountability with an illegal gambling operation. There is no house edge in cockfighting, but the platform always takes a good deal of share. For example, if the bets on the two fighting cocks are $10,000 each, it doesn't mean that your $100 will become $200. It might just be $185.
